skillTree.name: The Evergreen
skillTree.description: The Queen in the Woods influences every acre of her realm, her lifeforce ever intertwined with the forest itself.

skillTree.name: On Fertile Ground
skillTree.description: Wherever Ariel treads, trees and vegetation are compelled to spring forth to provide sustenance and haven for her kin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Forest’s Calling
skillTree.description: If the glades are to survive these dark times, the Queen needs champions willing and able to put other lands to the sword.

skillTree.name: Isha's Blessings I
skillTree.description: By Isha’s otherworldly influence, the Winds blow fortuitously across lands where her children need it the most.

skillTree.name: Isha's Blessings II
skillTree.description: Ariel is a conduit of deific power, capable of wielding spellcraft as if she herself were the Goddess of Nature.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.name: Aspects of Isha I
skillTree.description: The Mother’s demeanour is one of a wholesome Elven maiden, both of great beauty and bounteous lifeforce.

skillTree.name: Aspects of Isha II
skillTree.description: Ariel becomes ever more warlike as the decline of the natural world continues, thus perpetuating her dangerous, mothlike form.

skillTree.name: Forest's Gifts
skillTree.description: Every twig, stick, branch and trunk of Athel Loren is infused with the awesome power of nature in its rawest form.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to "Dart of Doom" and "Acorns of the Oak of Ages"
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Dart of Doom" and "Acorns of the Oak of Ages"
Cooldown: -50% to "Dart of Doom" and "Acorns of the Oak of Ages"

skillTree.name: Ripe Pickings
skillTree.description: "A robust and otherworldly vintage, with a distinctly spellbinding aftertaste."

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Berry Wine"
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Berry Wine"

skillTree.name: Terrible & Beautiful
skillTree.description: "All shall love me, and despair."

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Apotheosis Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Word of Pain"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Word of Pain Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Word of Pain Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Shield of Thorns
skillTree.description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tempest Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Dwellers Below
skillTree.description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Dwellers Below"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Dwellers Below Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Dwellers Below Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Life Bloom
skillTree.description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

skillTree.name: Eternal Sisterhood
skillTree.description: Ariel's handmaidens are imbued with the boundless energy of spring.

effects.description:
Global and Local Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Sisters of the Thorn units (minimum 1 turn)
	(local armies)

Armour-piercing Missile Damage: +15% for Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

Global and Local Recruitment duration: -2 turn for Sisters of the Thorn units (minimum 1 turn)
	(local armies)

Armour-piercing Missile Damage: +30% for Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Chosen Champion
skillTree.description: The Queen of the Asrai rarely commands armies, but those she empowers to lead the Deepwood Host do so with illustrious authority.

skillTree.name: Tapestry of Magic
skillTree.description: Ariel's magics interweave with those of her sorcerous acolytes, infusing the air with a harmony of power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
	(Hero's army)

Cooldown: -25% for bound spells on Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
	(Hero's army)

Number of uses: +1 for bound spells on Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

Cooldown: -50% for bound spells on Sisters of the Thorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Queen of Athel Loren
backgroundSkills.description: Once the foremost of the Elven magi who first settled Athel Loren’s glades, now an all-powerful Mage Queen of deep prophetic wisdom.

effects.description: Hidden effect on Ariel that gives Guardian to Orion
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
